description:
Rampo receives an invitation to a detective game from none other than E. A. Poe. He`s indifferent at first, until Poe reveals what the reward would be should he win.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Parte 1 - Poe e Rampo | Parte 2 - Moby Dick, che nuota nel cielo
Partie 1, Poe et Ranpo / Partie 2, La baleine blanche dans la mer céleste
Poe and Rampo / The Whereabouts of the Skyfaring Moby Dick
Sono Ichi: Poe to Ranpo / Sono Ni: Ten no Umi o Yuku Hakugei no Arite
Teil 1: Poe und Ranpo / Teil 2: Der weisse Wal im Himmelsmeer
其の一 ポオと乱歩 / 其の二 天の海をゆく白鯨のありて
